execution_plan.description: Retrieve all customer records from the EU sales system. The metadata does not include an explicit account creation timestamp, so use updated_at as a proxy for account creation when ranking newest accounts. Include a source marker so results from different systems can be distinguished at the application level.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id AS customer_id, email, full_name, country, updated_at, 'sales_eu' AS source FROM customers;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve all customer records from the US sales system. As above, use updated_at as a proxy for account creation and mark the source.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id AS customer_id, email, full_name, country, updated_at, 'sales_us' AS source FROM customers;
